activities: Our organization often works with EU based individuals and companies, receiving personal human resources information from executive management and staff level job seekers including resumes and C.V.s.  Personal information received from individuals frequently includes: a) current employers and employment history; b) educational background; c) family education; d) citizenship status; and e) long term professional goals.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We commit to cooperate with EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) as we process human resources data.  For all other unresolved complaints, we have designated the JAMS as our independent resource mechanism to resolve these disputes. You may contact the JAMS by one of the following means: Mail: 1920 Main Street, Suite 300, Irvine, CA 92614; Phone: 949.244.1810
